original: Lindgren, Johan Eric Malcolm, major, Visby, f. 15/5/01 i Halm^stad av majoren VVK Eric L. o. Emmy Jägerström. G. 1. 30 m. Inga Håkanson, d. 40; 2. 41 m. frih :an Anna Falkenberg. Barn: Stig f. 31, Jan 34, Lars 36, Ragnar 42, Carin 44. — Studiex. i Norrköp. 20, AIHS 26-28, sign:-offrkurs 30-31, SS 47. Fänr. v. Smål. artireg. 23, und ilöjtn. 25, v. Smål. arméart :reg. 28, löjtn. i reg. 28, v. reg. 30, förordn. kapt. v. Norrb. art :kår 37, kapt. v. Smål. art:reg. 39, major v. Gotl. art :kår 44. RSO.
translated: Lindgren, Johan Eric Malcolm, major, Visby, b. 15/5/01 in Halmstad to Major VVK Eric L. and Emmy Jägerström. Married 1. in 1930 to Inga Håkanson, d. 1940; 2. in 1941 to friherre Anna Falkenberg. Children: Stig b. 1931, Jan 1934, Lars 1936, Ragnar 1942, Carin 1944. — Graduated from Norrköp. in 1920, AIHS 1926-1928, sign:-off course 1930-1931, SS 1947. Second lieutenant in Småland artillery regiment from 1923, lieutenant from 1925, in Småland army artillery regiment from 1928, lieutenant in regiment from 1928, in regiment from 1930, appointed captain in Norrbotten artillery corps in 1937, captain in Småland artillery regiment in 1939, major in Gotland artillery corps in 1944. RSO (Royal Order of the Sword).
